version_description:
Thank for using eSound.
We update the app constantly to make sure your experience is always great.

In this update:
*fixed auto skip
*fixed heaphones controls
*bug fixes
*optimizations

If you need to report problems or recommend something, please write on our facebook page, where you can also contact the developers.
https://facebook.com/esoundapp

Enjoy it!

This version fix a lot of problem and glitches, making the app significantly more stable.
This version fix a lot of problem and glitches, making the app significantly more stable.

Thank for using eSound.

With this update we have improved many features, such as the offline mode, the background mode, the player and the library loading system.
Now the entire app is significantly more stable and fluid.

Hope you enjoy it.
If you need to report problems or recommend something, please write on our facebook page, where you can also contact the developers.
https://facebook.com/esoundapp

In this update:
*performance optimizations
*search in library
*haptic feedback
*tablet responsive (!)
*fixed background automatic skip (!)
*bug fixes

If you need to report problems or recommend something, please write on our social channels, where you can also contact the developers.

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/esound_music/
Website: http://esound.net16.net

Thank for using eSound.
We update the app constantly to make sure your experience is always great.

In this update:
*improved automatic skip
*screen lists optimizations

P.S: We noticed that many users have a problem when entering the app because it freeze and nothing is interactable, included the Library and Search screen. For those people, we recommend accessing the app completely offline, as it still works, as a temporary solution. However, we are already working hard to solve the problem in the next update.

If you need to report problems or recommend something, please write on our social channels, where you can also contact the developers.
Facebook: https://facebook.com/esoundapp
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/esound_music/
Website: http://esound.net16.net

Thank for using eSound.
We update the app constantly to make sure your experience is always great.
In this update:
*HOT* Added ALBUMS and ARTISTS
*HOT* Added search by YouTube Link (just paste YouTube Link on the search input)
* Added premium mode to remove advertisements
* Added possibility to report a song which does not work or it is wrong
* Added possibility to sort songs in library with different sorting functions
* Added explicit filter for children
* Important bug fixes

If you need to report problems or recommend something, please write on our social channels, where you can also contact the developers.
Facebook: https://facebook.com/esoundapp
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/esound_music/
Website: https://esound.app
